jobDescription: Do you want to play a pivotal role in protecting Booking.com user accounts against evolving threats? Are you eager to harness the full potential of data analysis to stay ahead of the curve? If your answer is yes, then join us in building a complex big data system that will ingest and enrich all necessary data streams across the security platform! Our work will directly impact end users, contributing to the protection of their accounts, and ensuring a positive experience on Booking.com!  Role Qualifications and Requirements Computer Science (or related field) degree and 3+ years of relevant work experience Proficiency in 1 or more server-side programming languages - preferably Python, Java Experience with crafting and building scalable and flexible data pipelines in distributed environments with technologies such as Hadoop, Cassandra, Kafka, MySQL. Experience using data-intensive processing frameworks (Spark, Kafka Streaming ) is a plus Strong algorithm and problem-solving skills Experience working with Kubernetes and Docker will be considered a plus. Excellent English communication (written and spoken) skills. Descrierea jobului You will be involved in designing the architecture and choosing the technologies to fit our high-performance requests in terms of data availability and consistency, response time, and traffic patterns, while working with the latest tech stack: Snowflake, Airflow, Spark, Kafka, AWS  Key Job Responsibilities and Duties Play a key role in creating scalable, flexible and high-performance data processing pipelines to enrich our analysis and machine learning models for prevention, detection, and remediation mechanisms. Focus on innovation to address complex technical issues associated with distributed systems. Own the solution end to end, from design and implementation to deployment and monitoring in production. Cultivate a collaborative environment by serving as a mentor and coach for the team members. Make us better as an organization by communicating your improvement ideas and proposals to partners beyond your team.  Benefits: Health insurance Prepaid medical subscription (Regina Maria) Life insurance Meal vouchers Learning wallet Travel benefit Annual vacation leave of 25 business days, pro rata with the working period Birthday day off Summer break (short Fridays during summer) Work from Abroad program (up to 20 days/year in EU) Floating days off 2 Volunteer days/ year Home office one-time bonus Bookster Linkedin learning platform Headspace Employee discounts (travel, gym, dental, vision) Descrierea companiei Booking Holdings Center of Excellence is part of Booking Holdings, the world's leading provider of online travel and related services, with a rich heritage of digital innovation. The Center provides access to specialized and highly skilled talent, supports projects powered by new and emerging technologies, leverages industry best practices, and fosters collaboration opportunities across all of the Booking Holdings brands, including Booking.com, Priceline, Agoda, KAYAK and OpenTable.  If you are interested to find out more about the Booking Holdings Center of Excellence visit our website: www.bookingholdings-coe.com.
